stories.original_headline: Scientists found the soil secret that doubles forest regrowth
stories.original_summary: New research shows tropical forests can recover twice as fast after deforestation when their soils contain enough nitrogen. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Earth's Secret for Swift Forest Renewal!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild, after long study, has revealed a hidden truth about the land. They found that tropical woods can recover twice as fast if their soil holds enough vital essence. This ancient knowledge helps the wise Green Wizards restore the enchanted forests, ensuring plentiful wood and berries for all.

stories.original_headline: Fewer offspring, longer life: The hidden rule of mammal aging
stories.original_summary: A large international study reveals that mammals tend to live longer when reproduction is suppressed. stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Discover a Key to Beasts' Longer Lives!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Order of Healers has uncovered a curious truth among the creatures of the realm. Beasts that do not bear many young tend to live longer lives, by roughly a tenth part. Male creatures avoid the fiery essence's toll, while females gain longevity by sidestepping the burdens of birth.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Scroll-Weavers' Guild Ends an Old Viewing Enchantment!
stories.fantasy_story: The renowned Scroll-Weavers' Guild, known for its wondrous moving images, has made a sudden choice. They have removed the magical viewing enchantment that allowed images to leap from one scroll to another without warning. While some lament its passing, the Guild promises new wonders in its stead.

stories.fantasy_headline: The Grand Illusionist's Guild Dispels Its Dream-Realm for Toil!
stories.fantasy_story: The mighty Visionary Clan, led by its Master Illusionist, once unveiled a grand dream-realm for collaboration known as the Hall of Whispering Echoes. This magical space was meant for artisans and scribes to work together from afar. Alas, the Clan has now announced the dispelling of this ambitious enchantment, closing the realm for good.
